item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ggtree and your publication will be featured here. 2018 DSYB catalyses the key step of dimethylsulfoniopropionate biosynthesis in many phytoplankton. Nature Microbiology, 2018. Amphibian chytridiomycosis outbreak dynamics are linked with host skin bacterial community structure. Nature Communications, 2018, 9:693. Molecular epidemiology reveals the role of war in the spread of HIV in Ukraine. PNAS, 2018, 115(5):1051-1056. 2017 Integrated view of Vibrio cholerae in the Americas.
